SEARCH
Package model

Class Item

java.lang.Object
model.Item
Direct Known Subclasses:
Accessory, DisplayItem, OrderItem, Plant
public abstract class Item extends Object
The Item class is an abstract class, holding all broad information about an item and provides functionality relevant to all Items The item class holds the itemID, itemName, description, price, quantity, type and image path of each product

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Item()
    Default constructor
    Item(int itemID, String itemName, String description, double price, int qty, String image_path)
    Constructor used for creating an Product Object for RETRIEVAL operations hence, the inclusion of itemID
    Item(String itemName, String description, double price, int qty, String image_path)
    Constructor used for creating an Item Object for INSERTION operations hence, the absence of itemID

  • Constructor Details

    • Item

      public Item()
      Default constructor

    • Item

      public Item(String itemName, String description, double price, int qty, String image_path)
      Constructor used for creating an Item Object for INSERTION operations hence, the absence of itemID
      Parameters:
      itemName - The Name of the Product
      description - The Description of the Product
      price - The Price of the Product
      qty - The Quantity of the Product
      image_path - The Image Path of the Product

    • Item

      public Item(int itemID, String itemName, String description, double price, int qty, String image_path)
      Constructor used for creating an Product Object for RETRIEVAL operations hence, the inclusion of itemID
      Parameters:
      itemID - The ID of the Product
      itemName - The Name of the Product
      description - The Description of the Product
      price - The Price of the Product
      qty - The Quantity of the Product
      image_path - The Image Path of the Product

      The type of product (e.g Plant, Accessory)
